sentence.Network_en: Basidiomycota ( basidiomycetes ) A phylum of the Fungi that includes the mushrooms and toadstools.
sentence.Network_cn: 担子菌:包括蘑菇和毒菌在内的一门真菌.

means.word_mean: 1. comprises fungi bearing the spores on a basidium; includes Gasteromycetes (puffballs) and Tiliomycetes comprising the orders Ustilaginales (smuts) and Uredinales (rusts) and Hymenomycetes (mushrooms, toadstools, agarics and bracket fungi); in some class
